sources.title: Kentucky Rifle
sources.description: In order to pass through Comanche territory, the stranded passengers of a West-bound wagon train must sell the Indians their rifles in this western from Carl Hittleman.

sources.title: Kentucky Rifle (1955) CHILL WILLSüçï LANCE FULLER
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Stars: Chill Wills, Lance Fuller, Cathy Downs
Director: Carl K. Hittleman

Step into the rugged frontier with this classic '50s Western from Howco Productions. Directed by Carl K. Hittleman, this gripping adventure captures the tension, danger, and determination of pioneers facing both natural obstacles and human conflict on the untamed American frontier.

The film stars Chill Wills in a commanding performance alongside Lance Fuller, Cathy Downs, and Sterling Holloway, with John Pickard, Henry Rowland, and Robert Keys adding depth to the story‚Äôs ensemble cast. Known for its authentic period detail and dynamic action sequences, this mid-century Western blends suspense, romance, and moral challenges as settlers risk everything to protect their dreams.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

Cinematography, atmosphere, and character-driven storytelling combine to deliver a film that stands out among 1950s frontier tales. For fans of vintage Westerns, American history, and the golden era of independent film, this is a must-watch piece of cinema heritage.

Relive the grit, courage, and drama of the West in a story as enduring as the Kentucky rifle itself.

#WesternMovies #ClassicWestern #1950sCinema #ChillWills #LanceFuller #CathyDowns #SterlingHolloway #CarlKHittleman #PizzaFLIX

metadata.Plot: A man escorts a wagon load of Kentucky rifles through Indian territory and must find a way to get through without losing the rifles to the Indians. Unfortunately the Indians know about it, and give the occupants an ultimatum: either the rifles or their lives.
metadata.Writer: Carl K. Hittleman, Lee Hewitt, Francis Chase Jr.
metadata.Actors: Chill Wills, Lance Fuller, Cathy Downs
